title: Determination of the quark coupling strength |Vub| using baryonic decays
title_cn: 夸克耦合强度的测定| Vub | 使用重子衰变
abstract: In the Standard Model of particle physics, the strength of the couplings of the b quark to the u and c quarks, |Vub| and |Vcb|, are governed by the coupling of the quarks to the Higgs boson. Using data from the LHCb experiment at the Large Hadron Collider, the probability for the Λb0 baryon to decay into the p final state relative to the final state is measured. Combined with theoretical calculations of the strong interaction and a previously measured value of |Vcb|, the first |Vub| measurement to use a baryonic decay is performed. This measurement is consistent with previous determinations of |Vub| using B meson decays to specific final states and confirms the existing incompatibility with those using an inclusive sample of final states.

title: Discovery of a Weyl fermion state with Fermi arcs in niobium arsenide
title_cn: 在砷化铌中发现具有费米弧的魏尔费米子态
abstract: Three types of fermions play a fundamental role in our understanding of nature: Dirac, Majorana and Weyl. Whereas Dirac fermions have been known for decades, the latter two have not been observed as any fundamental particle in high-energy physics, and have emerged as a much-sought-out treasure in condensed matter physics. A Weyl semimetal is a novel crystal whose low-energy electronic excitations behave as Weyl fermions. It has received worldwide interest and is believed to open the next era of condensed matter physics after graphene and three-dimensional topological insulators. However, experimental research has been held back because Weyl semimetals are extremely rare in nature. Here, we present the experimental discovery of the Weyl semimetal state in an inversion-symmetry-breaking single-crystalline solid, niobium arsenide (NbAs). Utilizing the combination of soft X-ray and ultraviolet photoemission spectroscopy, we systematically study both the surface and bulk electronic structure of NbAs. We experimentally observe both the Weyl cones in the bulk and the Fermi arcs on the surface of this system. Our ARPES data, in agreement with our theoretical band structure calculations, identify the Weyl semimetal state in NbAs, which provides a real platform to test the potential of Weyltronics.
abstract_cn: 三种费米子在我们对自然的理解中起着根本性的作用：狄拉克（Dirac），马约拉纳（Majorana）和韦尔（Weyl）。尽管狄拉克费米子已经有数十年的历史了，但后两者在高能物理学中并未被视为任何基本粒子，而已成为凝聚态物理学中备受追捧的宝藏。魏尔半金属是一种新型晶体，其低能电子激发表现为魏尔费米子。它引起了全世界的关注，并被认为将打开继石墨烯和三维拓扑绝缘体之后的凝聚态物理的新纪元。但是，由于Weyl半金属在自然界中极为稀有，因此实验研究受到了阻碍。在这里，我们介绍了反对称断裂单晶固体砷化铌（NbAs）中Weyl半金属态的实验发现。利用软X射线和紫外光发射光谱的结合，我们系统地研究了NbAs的表面和体电子结构。我们在实验中观察了整体中的Weyl锥和该系统表面上的费米弧。我们的ARPES数据与理论能带结构计算相一致，可以识别NbAs中的Weyl半金属态，这为测试Weyltronics的潜力提供了一个真正的平台。

title: Spontaneously broken time-reversal symmetry in high-temperature superconductors
title_cn: 高温超导体中自发破裂的时间反转对称性
abstract: Conventional superconductors are strong diamagnets that, through the Meissner effect, expel magnetic fields. It would therefore be surprising if a superconducting ground state would support spontaneous magnetics fields. Such time-reversal symmetry-broken states have been proposed for the high-temperature superconductors, but their identification remains experimentally controversial. Here we show a route to a low-temperature superconducting state with broken time-reversal symmetry that may accommodate currently conflicting experiments. This state is characterized by an unusual vortex pattern in the form of a necklace of fractional vortices around the perimeter of the material, where neighbouring vortices have opposite current circulation. This vortex pattern is a result of a spectral rearrangement of current-carrying states near the edges.
abstract_cn: 常规超导体是强磁石，通过迈斯纳效应可以驱除磁场。 因此，如果超导基态将支持自发磁场，将是令人惊讶的。 对于高温超导体，已经提出了这种时间逆对称破坏状态，但是它们的识别在实验上仍存在争议。 在这里，我们显示了一条具有打破的时间反转对称性的低温超导状态的路线，该路线可能适应当前相互矛盾的实验。 这种状态的特征是不寻常的涡流模式，其形式为围绕材料周长的分数涡流项链，相邻的涡流具有相反的电流循环。 这种涡旋图是边缘附近载流态的光谱重排的结果。

title: Accessing the fundamentals of magnetotransport in metals with terahertz probes
title_cn: 使用太赫兹探针了解金属中的磁传输原理
abstract: Spin-dependent conduction in metals underlies all modern magnetic memory technologies, such as giant magnetoresistance (GMR). The charge current in ferromagnetic transition metals is carried by two non-mixing populations of sp-band Fermi-level electrons: one of majority-spin and one of minority-spin. These electrons experience spin-dependent momentum scattering with localized electrons, which originate from the spin-split d-band. The direct observation of magnetotransport under such fundamental conditions, however, requires magnetotransport measurements on the same timescale as the electron momentum scattering, which takes place in the sub-100 fs regime. Using terahertz electromagnetic probes, we directly observe the magnetotransport in a metallic system under the fundamental conditions, and determine the spin-dependent densities and momentum scattering times of conduction electrons. We show that traditional measurements significantly underestimate the spin asymmetry in electron scattering, a key parameter responsible for effects such as GMR. Furthermore, we demonstrate the possibility of magnetic modulation of terahertz waves, along with heat- and contact-free GMR readout using ultrafast terahertz signals.
abstract_cn: 金属中自旋相关的传导是所有现代磁存储技术的基础，例如巨磁阻（GMR）。铁磁过渡金属中的电荷电流由两个非混合的SP带费米能级电子携带：一个是自旋的，一个是自旋的。这些电子会经历与自旋相关的动量散射，而局部电子来自自旋分裂的d波段。然而，在这样的基本条件下直接观察磁传输需要在与电子动量散射相同的时间尺度上进行磁传输测量，电子动量散射发生在低于100 fs的状态下。使用太赫兹电磁探针，我们可以在基本条件下直接观察金属系统中的磁传输，并确定自旋相关的密度和传导电子的动量散射时间。我们表明，传统的测量方法大大低估了电子散射中的自旋不对称性，这是造成诸如GMR等效应的关键参数。此外，我们展示了太赫兹波磁调制的可能性，以及使用超快太赫兹信号进行热和非接触式GMR读数的可能性。

title: External high-quality-factor resonator tunes up nuclear magnetic resonance
title_cn: 外部高品质因数谐振器调谐核磁共振
abstract: The development of powerful sensors for the detection of weak electromagnetic fields is crucial for many spectroscopic applications, in particular for nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR). Here, we present a comprehensive theoretical model for boosting the NMR signal-to-noise ratio, validated by liquid-state 1H, 129Xe and 6Li NMR experiments at low frequencies, using an external resonator with a high quality-factor combined with a low-quality-factor input coil. In addition to an enhanced signal-to-noise ratio, this approach exhibits striking features such as a high degree of flexibility with respect to input coil parameters and a square-root dependence on the sample volume, and signifies an important step towards compact NMR spectroscopy at low frequencies with small and large coils.

title: The free-energy cost of accurate biochemical oscillations
title_cn: 精确的生化振荡的自由能成本
abstract: Oscillations within the cell regulate the timing of many important life cycles. However, in this noisy environment, oscillations can be highly inaccurate owing to phase fluctuations. It remains poorly understood how biochemical circuits suppress these phase fluctuations and what is the incurred thermodynamic cost. Here, we study three different types of biochemical oscillation, representing three basic oscillation motifs shared by all known oscillatory systems. In all the systems studied, we find that the phase diffusion constant depends on the free-energy dissipation per period, following the same inverse relation parameterized by system-specific constants. This relationship and its range of validity are shown analytically in a model of noisy oscillation. Microscopically, we find that the oscillation is driven by multiple irreversible cycles that hydrolyse fuel molecules such as ATP; the number of phase coherent periods is proportional to the free energy consumed per period. Experimental evidence in support of this general relationship and testable predictions are also presented.
abstract_cn: 细胞内的振荡调节许多重要生命周期的时间。但是，在这种嘈杂的环境中，由于相位波动，振荡可能会非常不准确。仍然知之甚少，生化回路如何抑制这些相位波动以及产生的热力学成本是多少。在这里，我们研究了三种不同类型的生化振荡，代表了所有已知振荡系统共有的三个基本振荡基序。在所有研究的系统中，我们发现相位扩散常数取决于每个周期的自由能量耗散，遵循由系统特定常数参数化的相同逆关系。这种关系及其有效范围在噪声振荡模型中进行了分析显示。在微观上，我们发现振荡是由多个不可逆的循环驱动的，这些循环水解了诸如ATP之类的燃料分子。相干周期的数量与每个周期消耗的自由能成正比。还提供了支持这种一般关系的实验证据和可验证的预测。</ p>

title: Spectrum of controlling and observing complex networks
title_cn: 控制和观察复杂网络的频谱
abstract: Recent studies have made important advances in identifying sensor or driver nodes, through which we can observe or control a complex system. But the observational uncertainty induced by measurement noise and the energy required for control continue to be significant challenges in practical applications. Here we show that the variability of control energy and observational uncertainty for different directions of the state space depend strongly on the number of driver nodes. In particular, we find that if all nodes are directly driven, control is energetically feasible, as the maximum energy increases sublinearly with the system size. If, however, we aim to control a system through a single node, control in some directions is energetically prohibitive, increasing exponentially with the system size. For the cases in between, the maximum energy decays exponentially when the number of driver nodes increases. We validate our findings in several model and real networks, arriving at a series of fundamental laws to describe the control energy that together deepen our understanding of complex systems.
abstract_cn: 最近的研究在识别传感器或驱动器节点方面取得了重要进展，通过这些节点我们可以观察或控制复杂的系统。但是，由测量噪声和控制所需的能量引起的观测不确定性仍然是实际应用中的重大挑战。在这里，我们表明状态空间不同方向上控制能量的可变性和观测不确定性在很大程度上取决于驱动程序节点的数量。特别是，我们发现，如果所有节点都被直接驱动，则控制在能量上是可行的，因为最大能量随系统大小而线性增加。但是，如果我们的目标是通过单个节点控制系统，则在某些方向上的控制将受到极大的限制，并且会随着系统规模的增加而成倍增加。对于介于两者之间的情况，当驱动节点数量增加时，最大能量将呈指数衰减。我们在几个模型和真实网络中验证了我们的发现，得出了一系列描述控制能量的基本定律，共同加深了我们对复杂系统的理解。
